creator: mchassagneux@apache.org
text:
Add some cookies in a HTTP Cookie Manager, then switch to other component and back to it again. Result, you can't delete a row with the 'delete' button. 
You have to delete all field manually ...

creator: mchassagneux@apache.org
text: Workaroud : Add a new line, and the delete button is enable.
